name: Priya Natarajan
persona: Priya is a third-year mechanical engineering student who has a solid foundation in her coursework but sometimes struggles to maintain high grades. She is moderately conscientious and motivated to improve, showing resilience and perseverance despite occasional setbacks. While she sometimes experiences test anxiety, her determination helps her push through challenges. Priya is committed to finishing her degree and is working on building stronger study habits to boost her academic performance.
